titles.title: Upper Mississippi Headwaters Protection Act of 1988
A bill to restrict the Army Corps of Engineers' authority to increase releases from the headwaters reservoirs of the Upper Mississippi River.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

bill.summary: 8/3/1988--Introduced. Upper Mississippi Headwaters Protection Act of 1988 - Prohibits the Secretary of the Army from substantially increasing a release from any of the headwaters reservoirs in the Upper Mississippi River region in Minnesota unless the Secretary first transmits to specified congressional committees a report justifying such increase.
